channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 05:41 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyansky District- Kharkiv District- Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchan Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 05:41 The alarm has been sounded in the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyansky District- Kharkiv District- Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchan Territorial Community#Харківська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
